metadata.name: Potential DLL File Download Via PowerShell Invoke-WebRequest
metadata.comment: Detects potential DLL files being downloaded using the PowerShell Invoke-WebRequest cmdlet

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-webrequest ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('iwr '))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('outfile')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')))

output.summary: Detects potential DLL files being downloaded using the PowerShell Invoke-WebRequest cmdlet
